text: Juttadinteria is a genus of plants in the family Aizoaceae. Species include: * Juttadinteria deserticola (Marloth) Schwantes * Juttadinteria kovisimontana (Dinter) Schwantes * Juttadinteria simpsonii (Dinter) Schwantes * Juttadinteria suavissima (Dinter) Schwantes Category:Aizoaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Juttadinteria
